lines.text: It's the Cubs in the World Series - it's a dream of mine, sir.
What?
If I sink this put, you can go. What do you think of that? Hmmm?
I think you should keep your head down, arms straight, drop your shoulder, concentrate, focus, think of the hole, GET the ball in the hole!
Smell the hot dogs now, Jimmy. The crack of the bat; the roar of the crowd; you can order your tickets now, Jim.
[the ball misses the hole by a mile]

[after entering the mansion for the first time after finding the key and alarm codes in the filofax]
Wow! I'm on fucking Dynasty!
Just give me my reward and I'm outta here.
Reward, are you crazy? I should sue you for everything you've got!
I'd like to see that. I got nothing.
[pretending to be Spencer Barnes while making a toast during a business meeting]
A toast on that the Cubs may win the World Series... , and big tits.
Spencer... Toast.
Yeah... A toast! To the Cubs winning the world series!... and to big tits!
Half a day. Just a half a day. I'll make it up when I come back. I'll give you 2 weeks.
[Shakes head no as if struggling with the decision]
OK OK I'll give you 2 weeks solitary.

[Nods yes]
No can do.
Aw, COME ON! Lighten up, will ya? This game is SO important to me. It REALLY is. Come on this is just a minimum security prison, for Christ's sake!
[Warden and guard look up as if offended]
I mean a MAXIMUM minimum security prison - it's a tough prison, though.
Take away his TV priveleges.
Aw, COME ON! You can't take away my TV! I GOTTA watch the game. Come on - please don't be an asshole, all right?
Did you call me an asshole?

[to guard]
Did I say "asshole"? I didn't call him an asshole, did I?
Yep.
Take away everyone's TV priveleges, and let them know whose fault it is. NO ONE is gonna watch the game!
No - you can't... You can't!
NO ONE!
I didn't mean to call you an asshole - that's not what I meant! I meant assWIPE! You're an assWIPE!
[to guards]
And you - you LOOK like an asshole! And you look like another asshole!
I've worked HARD to work this hard!
That was the best safe sex I've ever had!
That was the best sex I've had in 2 years, 11 months, 3 weeks and 5 days!

[inside the prison]
Look me up when you get out.
OK. I get out in about 20 minutes.
In that case, forget it.

[from his hospital bed with tubes in him]
Spencer! You look awful!

[whispering to Spencer Barnes]
Like he looks great.
